scripts: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Bug CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE Bug (num INTEGER, title TEXT);
INSERT INTO Bug VALUES (1, 'Quotes don''t work'), (2, 'Highlighting looks weird'), (3, 'Posts are not automatically updated'), (4, 'Author link doesn''t work');
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Component CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE Component (id INTEGER, title TEXT);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS BugComponent CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE BugComponent (bug_num INTEGER, component_id INTEGER);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Bug CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE Bug (num INTEGER, title TEXT);
INSERT INTO Bug VALUES (1, 'Login button not working'), (2, 'Profile picture not updating'), (3, 'Search bar not displaying results');
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Component CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE Component (id INTEGER, title TEXT);
INSERT INTO Component VALUES (1, 'User authentication'), (2, 'User profile'), (3, 'Search functionality');
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS BugComponent CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE BugComponent (bug_num INTEGER, component_id INTEGER);
